heading: Dashboard For Doctors
description: Developed a doctor dashboard for practices in germany, which helps doctors connect with patients via messaging and managing other tasks.

heading: Retail Assistant
description: Developed a retail assistant which had its presence on Facebook messenger, Messaging app, Google Assistant. The retail assistant was used to organize and manage purchases across multiple retailers.

heading: Live Receipts
description: Implemented the backend services which were responsible for storing and retrieving all the purchases of the users and instantly sending custom receipts to channels like Facebook messenger and google assistant
